about_the_game:
When aboard the Alithea, you may feel that you're the center of the universe, but in reality the true heroes are the ones working behind the scenes to make sure that you're safe and taken care of. In this pack, we honor the everyday working heroes back at earth; the Waste Collectors, the Nurses, the Doctors and Firefighters that make sure you can sleep nicely in your cabin without worrying about being burned to a crisp.

To assist the residents aboard the Alithea, SIIC has introduced a roaming medical ambulance vruumba to take care of your every need; maybe you need a drink or a cigarette… or maybe you've actually gotten hurt.

Included Content:

  • Accessory: Stethoscope
  • Accessory: Working Hero Medal
  • Headwear: Forehead Mirror
  • Headwear: Firefighter Helmet
  • Headwear: Nurse Headwear
  • Headwear: Waste Collector Hat
  • Body: Doctors coat
  • Body & Legs: Firefighter
  • Body & Legs: Nurse
  • Body & Legs: Waste Collector
  • Feet: Firefighter shoes
  • Feet: Nurse shoes
  • Feet: Waste Collector shoes
  • Vruumba: Ambulance Vruumba
  • Vruumba Antenna: Ambulance Vruumba Antenna #1
  • Vruumba Antenna: Ambulance Vruumba Antenna #2

In this pack, we honor the everyday working heroes back at earth; the Waste Collectors, the Nurses, the Doctors and Firefighters that make sure you can sleep nicely in your cabin without worrying about being burned to a crisp.

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy First Class Trouble Working Heroes Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 / AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 Ti / AMD Radeon HD 7850
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: A microphone
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 / AMD Ryzen 5 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 280X or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: A microphone and headphones
